english.segment1: Lounging back in their golden chairs. Plastic smiles surrounded by their plastic hair. Tiny microphone in his swollen hand. Screeching out their praises up to Bula Land. He can't wait to die
english.segment2: A crowd of zombies listen as they wail and cheer. He's likely to expire in another year. Rejoice hallelujah, I want to die. I wanna see what happens in the blink of an eye
english.segment3: Overweight southern drawl, dissonant voice. Glazed over cloudy gaze lacks a choice. Their eyes roll back as they raise their hands. I think I see it coming, it's Bula Land!.
